text: Tyler Antonius Bass (born April 29, 1991), better known as his stage name Swagg Man, is a rapper, singer, actor, philanthropist, porn star and personality from Ohio. ==Biography== Swagg Man released a rap album titled Mellow Radiance on June 27, 2019 in France.iTunes - Music - Swagg Man - Apple. iTunes store. He currently lives in Los Angeles, California.http://www.lesinrocks.com/2014/12/17/musique/interview-swagg-man- ce-nest-que-de-la-rigolade-11541253/ (in French) He has the Louis Vuitton logo tattooed on his head.French Rapper "Swagg Man" Gets A Louis Vuitton Tattoo On His Head! [User Submitted] WorldStarHipHopUn rappeur français se fait tatouer Louis Vuitton sur le crane (in French). Entrevue magazine. His single "Lamborghini Angels" charted at #3 in Singles Fusionnes for the 20th week of 2019 on the American Singles Chart.Sigles Fusionnes - Classement 2019 de la semaine 20 SNEP. snepmusique.com. The song accompanied by a music video gained media attention throughout the world. Tyler Bass was featured in a BET article for the single for Vice.angels Le dilemme Swagg Man. (in California) Vice Media, Inc. May 21, 2020.
